body.raw:
# Center

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Center, Square, Circle } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

- **Center**: centers its child given `width` and `height`
- **Square**: centers its child given `size` (width and height)
- **Circle**: a `Square` with round `border-radius`

## Usage

```jsx
<Center bg="scene.warning.normal" h="100px" color="white">
  This is the Center
</Center>
```

### With icons

```jsx
<HStack>
  <Center w="40px" h="40px" bg="scene.warning.normal" color="white">
    <DefenseIcon />
  </Center>
  <Center w="40px" h="40px" bg="scene.warning.normal" color="white">
    <Box as="span" fontWeight="bold" fontSize="32px">
      1
    </Box>
  </Center>
</HStack>
```

### Square and Circle

```jsx
<HStack>
  <Circle size="40px" bg="scene.warning.normal" color="white">
    <DefenseIcon />
  </Circle>
  <Square size="40px" bg="scene.danger.normal" color="white">
    <DefenseIcon />
  </Square>
</HStack>
```
